values:
not really sure if i like working at guitar center.

first there is this fucking douche bag kid in my department, and i really really hate seeing him.

second, i hate feeling like i am competing for my rent. i kind of think i might just go to school, because this feels like i am going nowhere.

i wish i was in the red chord. and winning the lottery.

fuck life.

hey... someone sell me a 5150II for cheap.

and i love ana, sooo much and she's mad pretty.

weenies.

well, i guess i'm a name dropper because i talk to some dudes in real bands and not just shitty ones.

sorry douchebags.

well, this kid i work with at guitar center doesnt like me because i have better social skills than he does and i know way more about our department than he does... (and i think he is a fucking asshole) but anyway, he told nate yesterday that he wanted to punch me in the face because i wouldnt repair one of his costumers guitars for him: 1. because he didnt know how to do it and 2. because it was a big repair (shaving down the nut) and we have a fucking repair guy who comes in on wednesday, who fucking rules, and I'm not going to "steal" business from a dude i like.

so the bottom line is, i really like guitar center, with the exception of this one fucking pathetic pile of shit, and his genital warts.

i will either just let him hang himself by talking shit to a bunch of dudes that like me, or i will punch out, and then punch him out.

the end.

happy birthday jared.

(quick side note, i worked at the gorilla biscuits the other night, they were great and it was awesome to see yaritza, laura and felicia)

i got a car.... i have band practice with zach and todd...

i got a job at guitar center.

i love it so far.

give me cool stuff.

may go to pfizer again.

as paul would say "mad looties" 

free tookie.

last night i went to ipswich to go to luke's wedding party thing.

it was awesome to see mark and luke and sam and eli and stuff.

i had a fun time, and some good burgers.

some guy on craigslist wants to buy my Vox thing for $100. (which is awesome, and hopefully i can get rid of that Ampeg head too) 

i also went to my grandparents house the other day, because they got a new tv and couldnt figure out how to hook up the cable and the dvd player and all that. they are cute.

i had some other stuff to type on here, but i have to poop. so too bad.

refinished my telecaster... meh.

ana and i just had pasta.

i got beverly hills cop on dvd for Luke.

new issue of Justice came out on Wednesday... IT'S AWESOME!!!

someone buy my Ampeg SVT-350h... oh wait, only ana and marie read my journal.

weenies!

sanded all the finish off of my telecaster... 

dont know if i am gonna re-finish it.

i"m sleepy.

i'm going to bed.

everyone needs to come to our show on the 17th @ the QVCC.

goodnight.

today i bought some 5f5 to take the finish off of my tele.

shit didnt work.

so i went to work with some 40grit.

boring.

tomorrow i will use a palm sander when i get home and see how far i get.

boop.

also everyone can die.

i'm sleepy.

i got a telecaster.

i bought the wrong size potentiometers for it.

i'm going to bed

i just found the lyrics to our old intro written on the back of a list of shows the hostage heart was supposed to play. 

here they are.
enjoy.

a man drapes himself in black and white
one foot in bed with the serpent
(one step closer to the flood)
"i heard he's coming to claim us all"
"not you darling, you're mine."

apathy has become our currency
marking our hands for the fallout
paving our paths with crushed bone.

deception at it's very best
we are the walking dead.

stone cold steve austin and a giraffe on roids walk into a tattoo parlor.  and the pro wrestler has nothing valid to say, so him and the zoo animal cook up a lie to make themselves seem like the shit coming out of their mouths has some merit.

so, a liar and a douche bag or two douche bag liars try to "up their scene points" and end up talking shit to the wrong asian.

those dudes lives are the punchline. 

the end.

BOSS RV-3 digital delay/ reverb - $100

Ampeg SVT 350-h  - $298

Peavey 410tx      $250

VOX loop line Effects buffer (one rack space) - $100

occult history of the third reich 3 DVD box set- $15

half full water bottle 1.5L (once used by the singer of THH)  $65.98
wow... I'm on the hunt. I'm after you.

"i swear on my edge, i'll be careful"- what a fucking asshole.

in other news, one fucking awesome dude died.

i think i am gonna write a song for him. not the best guy in the world, but he was nothing but nice to me. he came to shows, started shit, stole money from people... but we loved him regardless. 

i'm not gonna front, he isnt a saint.. but i have never met anyone with a bad thing to say about him. 

it's a bum out.

"welcome to the bayou mother fuckers"

i just got a Tech21 Landmark 600.

it's fucking dope.

and i am getting a foot rub right now.

and i have the flu. (and so does ana)

i feel like i may die. (amd so does ana)

i bet we got sick from all the dirty germy bastards at metalfest.

eitherway, i am pretty excited about my bass head.

now i just need to sell the svt-350h.

the end.

"i want to see you move like it's going to get the shit out of your pants, you fucking retards."

i dont think i have ever heard a better mosh call. 

thanks, the acacia strain.

someone bring me dinner at ana's before i starve to death.

thanks

1. wake up, put laundry in the dryer, take shower.
2. coffee and a muffin
3. sell 250 tickets for metal fest (10:30am - 4:26pm)
4. turmoil (5ish) 
5. "wake the demons"
6. NATE JOHNSON FUCKING DRUNK AS FUCK! (10:21pm)
7. count money
8. walk to car (1:11am)
9. shower (1:43am)
10. finish LJ chronological top ten (2:02am)

goodnight.

i need a car on the double.

i think i can probly get a loan for about 3500 and not be in over my head.

let me know if you have any ideas.

i want something like a kia sportage. because i have an ampeg 8x10

so ANA bought the LAST DRAGON... because i know none of you fuckers got it for me.

my birthday is on Monday.

i went to see "WOOS" tonight, it was pretty funny to see Sargent Slaughter sing for a mosh metal band.

222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222222

i also saw Stray From the Path. ( i love those dudes)

i'm gonna kill myself to spite the rest of you.

i'm dead.

i really want a Vespa. 

i think i want to just clothesline a mod and take his. 

let me know what you think. i just think it would be really funny to see my fat ass on a vespa.

and, i love ana... boop doop bee.

as you know, my birthday is coming up... and this is my wishlist.

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00005JD5H/fastrewind-20/002-6767727-3644849

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00007BK2Q/ref=pd_sxp_elt_l1/002-6767727-3644849?n=130

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0688150144/sr=8-2/qid=1144456235/ref=pd_bbs_2/002-6767727-3644849?%5Fencoding=UTF8


http://www.fender.com/products/search.php?partno=0194160750

thanks <3 xchristopherx

http://boston.craigslist.org/msg/149145880.html

buy my shit, or trick one of your fucking friends into buying my shit. 

shit.

i cant wait to get out of here.

i also think i am gonna do another study before the summer.

lastly "they schools cant teach us shit, my people need freedom, we tryin to get all we can git, all my highschool teachers can suck my dick, tellin me white man lies, straight bullshit"

today at around 7:30am i listened to the humpty dance about 15 times in a row, and fantasized about paul and i going into a karaoke bar and him getting up and singing it... and thinking about paul singing "i'm the one who said just grab em' in the buisicuts" made me laugh for a few hours.

oh and the red chord is my favorite band. (unless paul makes a band that is just him rapping that digital underground song... and it would have to be called sex packets)

bye

today i listened to some old albums that i havent listened to in a while... 

like:
HATEBREED "satisfaction is the death of desire"
Holding Hannah "this time we'll let the music do the writing EP"
Elliott Smith "XO"
Arsis "a celebration of guilt"
As Tall as Lions "lafcadio"
the Anchorline "sorry doesnt mean anything EP"
7th Rail Crew "static" (the old one with both singers, and the yellow cover)

and i decided that i really like every one of them. except for that song on the ATAL album about smoking... that just fucking grosses me out every time i hear it.

ok now, if all of you would get up from your computers and walk out into traffic, i would be a happy man.

die.

i really want one of those mexican p basses that guitar center had for like a few months in the natural finish. but i dont think they carry them anymore, and i only want to spend $200 dollars on it. so if anyone has one... give it up.

also i am so bored in here, i have been sleeping alot... i feel alot better now that i am getting some real sleep. the hostage heart is having practice today, i hope all goes well (i mean i dont want to get "blown off the stage" by someone who has no fucking personality)

i had been looking at craigslist for a few hours and i spotted some awesome deals, but then i noticed i was looking at the san francisco/ bay area, and i was pissed. but i guess it's good that i didnt email jared any links. HA!

i miss being able to do what i want... i really dont want to spend $1000 for rent, if i didnt have to i wouldnt be here. 

three things i hate:
1. hippies
2. slimy dudes (and slimy girls for that matter)
3. anyone who reads this journal and isnt really my friend. you should fuck off.

lye by mistake just got signed to Lambgoat records.

i hope andrea united edge doesnt take them to court.
but i do hope that she gets aids and dies.

i won... ha ha ha.

i am selling my eden 410... someone buy it for $275 (by the way, that is a fucking awesome deal)

also. someone should buy my sr500 for $280... also an awesome deal.

goodnight.

so today i had daddys junk music in springfield send a bass to shrewsbury for me. they better not fuck it up.

i think i may get an 810 as well.

so up for grabs may be an Eden d410t and an Eden d115. but i may keep them, i dont know.

also an ibanez sr500.

i miss ana a bunch. 

i think i may hang out with geoff on tuesday when i get out of here, ill call him tomorrow and see what he wants to do. otherwise i may just go home at 8am. we'll see how it goes.

i still miss ana a whole bunch.

goodnight.

(i will also be starting an "overheard in pfizer" section of my journal.)

last night paul and i went to warwick rhode island. we went to this store in Pawtucket that had a bunch of different color marshalls. they also had two "major" heads. that are all tube 200 watts. the only ampeg gear they had was fucked. 

we went to a BBQ place . i had the smoked sausage, half a white meat bbq chicken, pulled pork, mashed potatoes and brocolli. for 14.99.... totally worth it.

i also called nate fiske about buying his 610... i dont know if he is into it. paul says there is a crease in one of the speakers. i still want it though.

pfizer is really boring. and its only the first day.

i miss ana... and paul. i think i am gonna go out to NY twords the end of april.

thats all for now. beep.

no ipod + five more days here = me, pissed.

i dont have a charger for it, so it is pretty much dead. i just forgot to buy one.

i am gonna eat dinner now. plop.

i just watched rent. it was pretty crappy.

i wouldnt suggest it. the songs are boring. there is one harmony part that ruled in the middle, but i thought the rest was lame.

today was ana's birthday.

the end.

someone buy my hartke 3500 for $350 dollars.

it's 350w at 4ohms. it's in awesome condition.

has low and high contour as well as a built in compression (that is pretty sweet)

buy it!

well, i am home right now, and i will be leaving in about two hours... that's it, i am home for about 3 hours a week... i should just move out. if anyone wants to let me "live" with them for free, let me know. i'll be home about two times a week, i would need a place to put my computer and my clothes. i wouldnt make a mess. i can provide funny stories and lots of fart smell when i am around. otherwise you wont ever see me. 

oh and so i am listening to the Casket Lottery and i am wondering how the fuck mark switch broke his thumb at thier show, and then i realized that it was glasscasket that he broke his thumb at.

mike and i are getting matching tattoos i think. that should be really funny.

 oh and i have been reading about "underpowering" and i am afraid to turn on my bass stuff now. this is sooooo gay.(and not the good gay like Andre... the bad kind like nu-metal)

i want to get a svt610hlf... 

i am really really sick. i think i got aids from paul.

if i die, give all my bass stuff to jared.
i was thinking today... andrea united edge is a shit bag.

i get to leave on monday!
yay!

turns out i didnt get the drug at all, i just got water every time.....

i win.

out of jail for the next few days...

i'm in maries basement... and im fucking bored. 

someone be awake, somewhere.

so, its rainy and i am gonna walk to the bus station in like an hour an a half... and then sit there until three.... it should be fun.

OH!!! i just watched the newer star wars movie, something to do with the sith. it was awesome.

"whatchu know about that?" 

"uh i dont know?"

"yeah, whatchu know about that?"

"um... (shrug)"

life is awesome

i really like Armor for Sleep...
the dinner here was bad, so i threw most of it out.
i just had a cookie and some canned manderian oranges.
i cant wait to have some pizza

the end.

i think the deal with this place is that they just dont know how to control the heat, it is either really hot or really cold. i think that sucks.

two more days!
